comments:
Description:
Contents are overlaped and mixed in html file when run 
eServices_private_securitiesdata.xml

Steps to reproduce:
1. run attached file.
2. view generated html file

Expected result:
see attached golden file

Actual result:
Contents are overlaped in html file.
Generated pdf file cannot be opened and is a damaged file.

This is not a bug. The overlapped content is caused by absolutely positioned
grid item in the Page Header.
Generated pdf file cannot be opened and is a damaged file! This should be fixed.

Exceptions when generate pdf file:
SEVERE: fo2pdf failed
